title: Historical walk
text: If you enjoy History then this one is perfect, even just a evening walk will do the trick. from here you can go further to the centrum and enjoy the late hours

title: nice evening walk
text: A very beautiful bridge and cannot be missed when in Cordoba. For a nice romantic walk or nist emjoying the scenery

title: Chinese food Cordoba
text: We came a bit early but they let us in anyway. We had rice noodles and chicken with sesamseed. we did not have to wait long. It was very tasty and we had chinese tea. price and quality is very acceptable.

title: stopped for a bite. no regrets
text: nice people and very helpfull, service with a smile. wonderfull food and perfect olive oil. the chicken was very tender. very patient service.

title: funny houses
text: As mentioned before in a earlier review, these are funny looking houses and you will wonder where you are.. in Italy?? A must see in Puglia
place: I Trulli di Alberobello - World Heritage Site

title: where am I?
text: I heard about, read about it.. and had to see it. well I was not dissapointed. funny houses called Trulli or Trullo and we even found a real old original one. A must see when in Puglia.

title: amazing
text: what a view, simply amazing. just walking around the area and seeing the coast is an adventure and so worth the trip. romantic ... yes, beautifull .. yes

title: amazing bridge
text: This bridge was made at the cost of 1 tower of the castle. But it is 1 one a kind in the world. it only takes 3 minutes to open or close.

title: yummy
text: we came a bit early but what a treat, nice people and good food, we were treated like king and queen, it rained a lot but that did not stop us.

title: watch your fingers
text: We had great burgers, good taste, specially the smokey taste. It is made in a oven at the bar, fantastic. nice lady that served us. But watch your fingers you could end up eaten those as well.

title: crowdy surprise
text:
we came late from the airport and found this place, we decided to try. the gentlemen stated that if we did not like this food we do not need to pay :).
we had to wait as a big grouo came to order as well but we were friendly asmed to hang on a bit. and.... it was worth it. we got a great dish and we finished it all. Good food and friendly people. must try .. we did pay after all and it was perfect

title: A rest moment
text:
After a long trip and spending time in Koln, we had a nice rest in this hotel. it is close to the Rhein and the service is good. nice people and speak english too.
The breakfast was compleet and there was a lady who took care of the coffe and tea. I recommend this place, specially if you like a walk along the Rhein

title: A moment together
text:
Finally after a long time we had family time, and this Korean restaurant was a great choice. the lady who served us helpes explaining how things work. not only the BBQ bit also what is traditional in Korean culture.
The food was excellent, it was so good that I forgot to make a picture ;)

title: interesting place
text: Very interesting place to visit. BUT be aware.. it is very demanding on your strength for walking and climbing in hot weather. Bring some water with you. the local water is drinkable but tastes like a swimmingpool... a lot of gloride is added

title: complete food.
text: service with a smile, lovely people, and .. mmm the food.. must try. Greek at its best. the place is not hard to find. near the metro M2 (see the picture fot the station to get to)

title: Recommended
text:
we had a great stay, lovely people and ready to help anytime. the assistant manager George Manakis was funny and helpfull in everyway. we got good tips to go to. Breakfast was good. the service ladies ever so friendly.
If you lika to stay in a quiet area with plent food place nearby and sightseeing.. this is the place to stay.

title: Real Greek
text: A nice young lady helped us, her english is good enough to have a chitchat. service with a smile and good food. very recommended. Even yhe couple beside us asked for more

title: dissapointed
text:
Unfortunately we are a dissapointed, we had 2 rooms and in both rooms the airconditioning did not work. finally after a unfriendly employee did some checking it worked. later in 1 room it did not work again. our friend did not sleep at all as it was too hot. the badroom is very small for big people. the bed is not cozy and the sheets are itchy.
some positive things, the receptionists are very friendly and helpfull. breakfast and diner are not bad at all but no chocolate spread for bread at breakfast (minor detail). the capucino is more hot chocolate then coffee. location is good.

title: Hamburger hamburger
text: It takes a bit of time but once you understand the system you can get agreat hamburger meal. prices very acceptable. Service with a smile. The waittres even sat down and took time with us to get the correct meal

title: Beautifull garden
text: This is a nice place to wonder around these gardens, it more then1 actually, there is a French Garden and an English one, a little house of 250 years old can be in these gardens where the king would have some private time. Bring some picnic stuff with tou and you will have a great day, you can stay untill dark.

title: Worth waiting for, a little gem
text: We were advised to go here once we would be in the area, so we did. first impression was .. "a simple place". We had to wait almost 1 hour, it was that busy. BUT once we got our ribs... what a taste, Best ever ribs, a real fun and great experience not only for the eye bit also for the mouth. There is so much going here, looking around there are so many pictures and stuf to look at. But again the taste... just must have tried this to understand how delicious this is.

title: after a long day and want to eat
text: Always great to eat here, good Chinese food and plenty of choice. Very busy as always, proof of good food for the rigth prices.

title: Turkish delight
text: A small but nice place to sit and eat some Turkish food, Donner teller or Donner tasche. very friendly people and service with a smile. we got so much food that we diceded to take the leftover home. real tasty.

title: Bubble tea and more
text: In Koln when you feel for a treat of bubble tea or some other nice drink (non alhocol) then this is the place to go. a lot of different tastes. A cold tea with choices.

title: good food
text: it is a nice restaurant with veey friwndly people, good chinese food. it is a boat on the river Rhein. Good service and food, very recommended

title: must see if near Bonn
text: only 7 euro to get in. its a marvelous place to wander. good for walks as well in thw surroundings. nice place to hang around

title: short trip
text:
To be honest I cannot give a full 5 star. But it should have been. the negatives first: we arrived on time but the lady was far from friendly, only much later she changed a bit. we felt unwelcome at first. the room..... what can I say we found a cleaningclotg as if someone would come back to finish ths job. the bathroom is outdated and needs a renovation. at the window we found a lot of insect.. dead.

Now the positive.

The beds are perfect, a nice thing was that we got complimentary drinks and snacks, that made every bad thing go away. The breakfast is great and very compleet. we slept very well and had a nice walk in the area.

So all in all not a bad place to be, a good hotel for long or short stays, other facilities are present.

We would come back again.

title: The real Bali
text: What a wonderfull place to be if you love tropical country ricefields and mountain view. The Gunung Agung is closeby and provides amazing views in the morning. a pool is available and a small cummunity kitchen is there as well, however if you need anything you can always call for service

title: Lovely place
text: Close to the beach and malls at Kuta. affordable prices and good breakfast. swimmingpool at the rooftop. very friendly people. Big room with fridge and watercoocker to make koffie or tea. If you need anything.. just call and the service is with a smile. Spa available

title: Saturday market
text: you can stroll over the market, buy things or not. fresh fruit or a roasted chicken or for fish lovers all kinds of fish. and lots more. typical Dutch haring, you hate or love it.. beside the market place there all kinds of shops to be found and when the sun is out you can relax near the open water.

title: Ancient days
text: Once strolling in Aosta you can walk into the Port od ancient times, around 25BC if I am not mistaken. you cannot miss it as you walk around the old town and enjoy a cappucino.. and Gelato

title: Perfect Pizza
text: A must go when in Aosta Italy. after a good walk in the old town it is a perfect Pizzeria to drop in. we had a delicious salad an 2 very tasty pizza's. the people are very cheerfu and like to make fun conversation. a big smile and great service. We loved it, a nice stroll in the dark back to our car, felt very save in Aosta area and had a content meal. what more can I ask.

title: beautifull Swiss
text: such a beautifull place and worth the trip, nature at its best, swimming in the lake, with a boat to Interlaken, using the guest pass will get you this trip for free during your stay. also buss trips in the arwa are for dree. dont forget to check out the Rolex shop while your there and get a free gift

title: Exploring Friesland
text: Basic Hotel, nice employees and good location. You can either walk or go by car to the centre of Joure. From this location you can explore the Provence Friesland. Have a bite in the local food and "knip worst". Loads of History to be found from Joure to Dokkum

title: Joure
text: Nice city to wonder around, not only scenic but also real country atmosphere. nice centre with Fries culture

title: All you can eat top quality
text: we thougth the price was high but once we were inside.... they will bring you to your table and there is always someone nearby for helping you the buffet is overwhelming. all kinds of asian food and non asian. Perfect meat, great grill, wonderfull salads. for sushi lovers all is there, wanna wok.. go get it. worth the money in every way. drinks for free only spritis you pay except for wine and beer, thats included.

title: Lovely food and ambiance
text: Wonderfull salad, good food and service. Nice for Romance or family and parties. Service with a smile.. and if you cannot eat it all... you can take it home :-)

title: Spareribs
text: Spareribs.. or bearribs.. good quality and as much as you can eat on certain days. It can be crowdy on some days.

title: More then satisfactory
text: Wonderfull people, great service with a smile. great tips from the Lobby and a surprise memory te have a bottle of champane because of my wifes birthday. Thanks Guys. we enjoyed our stay. A shuttle available to 3 places, good food, great breakfast.

title: Butter chicken
text: The butter chicken was great, the biryani rice was not as expected, looked like cut rice noodles but tasted good.

title: Wandeling/walking
text: Wonderfull reserved nature, nice for a picnic or romantic walk, biking or hiking. Birdwatching or enjoy some quite time.

title: Lovely stay, would go there again any time.
text: What a nice Hotel and nice people, Top service, very helpful and always ready to serve. Joshua and Terence (and if not mistaken Manager Aimson) helped us in many ways. Clean hotel and smiling service. small room but perfect for our 3 night stay. Even our luggage we could leave with them a full day before we had to go to the airport (we still had almost 1 day to go so we enjoyed a luggage free last day).
